about_the_game:
Add Red Pistol to your wishlist now and join the battle for survival in the cursed Wild West!

Survive the Supernatural Wild West in Red Pistol!

The Old West has been overrun by undead forces, and only the strongest can survive. As a fearless cowboy with a mysterious past, you’ll face hordes of zombies, terrifying bosses, and unleash magical abilities in a fast-paced, action-packed roguelike. Will you survive the relentless assault of the undead, or become just another victim in this forgotten land?


Play as a lone cowboy armed with more than just a pistol. Channel supernatural abilities alongside your sharpshooting skills to defeat waves of enemies. From explosive magic bullets to devastating area spells, your powers are the key to survival. Explore the desolate towns, ghostly forests, and eerie deserts as you fight to uncover the truth behind the undead plague.

INTENSE GUNFIGHTS

Prepare for high-speed action! Face overwhelming hordes of zombies, rogue undead gunslingers, and monstrous bosses, each with their own unique mechanics and attacks.

  • Bullet Hell Combat: Dodge hundreds of bullets while returning fire with precision and power.

  • Procedural Levels: Each run brings new maps and challenges, ensuring no two games are the same.

  • Tough Bosses: Defeat powerful enemies like Iron Heart, the unstoppable armored zombie, and others that stand in your way.

Between battles, upgrade your weapons, unlock new magical powers, and acquire powerful items that boost your abilities. Your journey through the supernatural Old West is full of choices:

  • Weapon and Magic Combos: Mix and match firearms and spells to create the ultimate combat strategy.

  • Permanent Progression: Gather resources from each run to permanently improve your character and abilities.

  • Item Shop: Visit mysterious merchants to unlock new weapons, upgrades, and other essentials for survival.

Every failure brings new knowledge, power, and a second chance. As you die and restart, you'll discover new secrets, abilities, and NPCs that change your journey.

  • Endless Replayability: Every run feels different with procedurally generated levels, items, and enemies.

  • Rich Lore and Hidden Mysteries: Dive into a deep and dark story as you uncover the truth behind the undead invasion.

  • Meet Strange Characters: Encounter NPCs with their own backstories, each revealing pieces of a larger mystery.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 18.04 (64-bit) or equivalent
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-2100 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.2 compatible with 1 GB VRAM (Intel HD Graphics 4000 or equivalent
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04 (64-bit) or equivalent
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-650 or AMD FX-8350
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.2 compatible with 2 GB VRAM (NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660 or AMD Radeon HD 7870)
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
